    • Constructor Detail

      • RecipeController

        public RecipeController()

    • Method Detail

      • writeRecipe

        public static void writeRecipe(Recipe recipe,
               Context context)
        Writes Recipe to SQL local database, and if it has internet access also writes the Recipe to the webservice.
        Parameters:
        recipe - Recipe object to be written.
        context - Context is required to access database.

      • deleteLocalRecipe

        public static void deleteLocalRecipe(java.util.UUID uuid,
                     Context context)
        Deletes Recipes from the local database. Recipes cannot be deleted from the webservice.
        Parameters:
        uuid - UUID of recipe to be deleted
        context - Context is required to access database.

      • updateRecipe

        public static void updateRecipe(java.util.UUID uuid,
                Recipe recipe,
                Context context)
        Write over old recipe with the same UUID
        Parameters:
        uuid - Recipe id.
        recipe - Recipe object holding new data to be updated.
        context - Context is required to access database.

      • getLocalRecipe

        public static Recipe getLocalRecipe(java.util.UUID uuid,
                    Context context)
        Retrieves a recipe from the local database based on recipeId.
        Parameters:
        uuid - UUID of recipe to be retrieved
        context - Context is required to access database.
        Returns:
        Recipe object from local device

      • updateServerRecipe

        public static void updateServerRecipe(Recipe recipe)
        Deletes old recipe with the same UUID, rewrites it with the new one.
        Parameters:
        recipe - Recipe with updated data.

      • checkInternetConnection

        public static boolean checkInternetConnection(Context context)
        GC: Check for an active internet connection. Follows format from stack overflow post: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4238921/ android-detect-whether-there-is-an-internet-connection-available
        Parameters:
        context - Context is required to access database.
        Returns:
        Boolean on whether device is online or not.

      • synchronize

        public static void synchronize(Context context)
        Check all local recipes to see if they have been updated. If so they are pushed to the server. Then check to see if any recipes in the local cache have updated copies on the sever. If so they are pulled down and overwrite the local copy.
        Parameters:
        context - Context is required to access database.
